admin/mapp-cloud.navigation.label: Mapp Cloud Integration
admin/mapp-cloud.intelligence-info: To use this app you will need an active Mapp Intelligence account. Get in touch with our customer support or sign up for your three-month free trial.
admin/mapp-cloud.intelligence-trackid-la: Enter your Mapp Tag Integration ID
admin/mapp-cloud.acquire-info: You can add Mapp Acquire support to your Mapp Cloud app. Get in touch with our customer support to create a Mapp Acquire account.
admin/mapp-cloud.engage-info: Native Marketing Automation and CDP is coming soon. In the meanwhile please explore what Mapp Engage has to offer here.
admin/mapp-cloud.insights-info: In-App Dashboards are coming soon. In the meanwhile please explore what Mapp Intelligence has to offer here.
